dl_earfcn.title: DL EARFCN
dl_earfcn.description: Downlink E-UTRA Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the cell

ul_earfcn.title: UL EARFCN
ul_earfcn.description: Uplink E-UTRA Absolute Radio Frequency Channel Number of the cell. By default a frequency corresponding to dl_earfcn is chosen.

tac.title: Tracking Area Code
tac.description: Tracking Area Code in hexadecimal representation (range 0x0000 to 0xffff)

root_sequence_index.description: Range: 0 to 837. Set the PRACH root sequence index (SIB2.rootSequenceIndex field). It must be different for each neighbour cell operating on the same frequency and sharing the same PRACH configuration.

cipher_algo_pref.title: Preferred Cipher algorithms
cipher_algo_pref.decription: Set the preferred algorithms for RRC and User Plane encryption in decreasing order of preference. If none match the UE capabilities, then EEA0 (no encryption) is selected.

integ_algo_pref.title: Preferred Integrity algorithms
integ_algo_pref.decription: Set the preferred algorithms for RRC integrity check in decreasing order of preference. If none match the UE capabilities, then EIA0 (no integrity check) is selected. (Default: EEA2, EEA1)
